hero.title: Inner Ascend
hero.subtitle: Open the Gates of Remembrance
hero.features: A ceremonial passage into truth, held with lineage, trauma-informed care, and deep presence.
hero.disclaimer: By application only—for those who feel the call.

whatIsBufo.title: The Sacred Medicine
whatIsBufo.subtitle: Return to what you've always been
whatIsBufo.intro: The most potent and profound entheogenic compound on Earth
whatIsBufo.paragraph1: 5-MeO-DMT is the only substance that can reliably introduce individuals to a state of full non-dual awareness, override the energetic structure of the ego, and reveal the unitary nature of reality. The medicine we work with is natural Bufo secretion, obtained through non-harmful, ethical, and lineage-guided methods by trained specialists in the Sonoran Desert. The toads are not harmed.
whatIsBufo.paragraph2: This is not a psychedelic. It is a sacred teacher of dissolution and pure remembrance. The effects begin within
whatIsBufo.paragraph2Cont: of inhalation. Despite its intensity, the passage is held in complete safety, grounding, and expert guidance. Complete ego dissolution. Non-dual consciousness. The remembrance of what you've always been.
whatIsBufo.quote: This work is by application only. If you are here, you were directed intentionally—guided, invited, or called. This medicine is not for everyone, and it is not a shortcut. This path requires humility, surrender, and integration.

whoThisIsFor.title: This Medicine Is For...
whoThisIsFor.subtitle: (And who it's not for)
forList: Those who've done deep inner work and feel called to complete something
Those seeking dissolution of illusion, not an experience
Those ready to surrender and integrate
Those who can no longer pretend
notForList: Those with untreated trauma or psychosis
whoThisIsFor.quote: You're not broken. You're not lost. You're initiating.

threePhaseJourney.title: The Three-Phase Journey
threePhaseJourney.description: Sacred medicine work requires preparation, presence, and integration. This is not a shortcut. This is the work of a lifetime.

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Open the field. Anchor the nervous system. Begin with clarity.

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.description: A sacred passage into remembrance. Held with lineage, trauma-informed care, and full presence.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Insight becomes embodiment. Anchoring remembrance into daily life.

threePhaseJourney.quote:
Insight without integration is just spiritual entertainment.
This isn't a quick fix. This isn't a weekend workshop.
This is the work of a lifetime—compressed into the time your soul needs.

seriLineage.title: Nina & Astral
seriLineage.subtitle: Initiated by Seri Tribe Elders in the Sonoran Desert, Mexico
seriLineage.paragraph1: This path shaped us before we ever held space for others. We know the terrain from the inside. This work is held with deep reverence for the indigenous lineage from which it comes. Nina and Astral have been initiated as daughter and son of the Seri Tribe by elders in the desert of Sonora, Mexico.
seriLineage.paragraph2: The medicine is received in a respectful, traditional way by specialists, in alignment with the Seri lineage we have been initiated into. The toad is never harmed. Years of training in trauma-informed approaches, energy healing, and the sacred art of holding space for ego dissolution. Guest speakers in facilitator training programs. Hundreds of ceremonies guided with safety, presence, and deep respect.
seriLineage.quote: We have sat with the medicine. We have dissolved, returned, and broken open again. We hold this work with reverence. If you feel called, let's walk slowly. This is sacred territory—not a service.

imageQuote.quote:
Die before you die, and discover
there is no death.

testimonials.transition: Words from people who've walked this path.
testimonials.title: Voices From The Journey

items.quote: The healings I went through with Nina & Astral were deep and transformative. Through their practice, they are able to prise issues from the mind and release them through the heart. Their compassion and belief allows vulnerability in the unknown, acceptance of ugly realities and enables you to rise above blocks we accumulate along with our lives. They showed me how to love myself, that experience is strength, and our power runs further than this body.
items.name: Holly

items.quote: Nina & Astral gave me a gift, by healing wounds that had been present in me since I was a child. We cleared issues that were causing me to have weird dynamics with women. They set me free and I'll never be the same. They helped me become a man. I feel confident in myself and my abilities now.
items.name: Jon

items.quote: I could feel their presence in the higher realms—helping me to go deeper into the quest. I felt secure, held, seen, and fully accepted so I could trust and surrender. I feel so young! Clear and joyful, like a child. I accept where I'm at and know myself better.
items.name: Anonymous

items.quote: The work with Nina & Astral was one of the most profound transformations I have ever had. They take you straight into the subconscious mind so together you find the cause of your limiting beliefs and clear them. This is the healing of the future, in the 5th dimension, working in the quantum field that enables healing to be instantaneous.
items.name: Hazel

pricingTransparency.title: Pricing
pricingTransparency.subtitle: This work is offered with reverence, discernment, and deep presence. Pricing reflects the time, preparation, energetic holding, and integration required—while remaining aligned with local realities in Mexico.

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Optional but highly recommended for first-time participants
preparation.includes: Emotional readiness assessment, nervous system anchoring, intention refinement, safety & medical review

ceremony.title: Ceremony
ceremony.includes: Pre-ceremony consultation, opening prayer, ceremony, breath/touch/sound support, full day of care, 48hr integration, 2-week follow-up
ceremony.note: Ceremony dates are only offered after preparation and mutual discernment.

integration.title: Integration
integration.includes: Meaning-making, somatic grounding, repatterning, lifestyle integration, continued support

accessibility.title: Accessibility
items: When the call is genuine, we walk together
If finances are a barrier, speak openly
accessibility.quote: No one is ever turned away for genuine calling and readiness.

pricingTransparency.medicalNote: Safety is sacred. All participants must complete a medical questionnaire and review before any ceremony.

readyToBegin.title: Ready to Begin?
readyToBegin.quote: This work is never sold. Only offered.
readyToBegin.description: If you feel the call, begin with the application process. This is an invitation to discernment— for both of us. Not everyone is a fit. And that's sacred.
readyToBegin.disclaimer: Private application · Discernment process · Medical screening required
